hero.title: Which AI Actually Works?
hero.subtitle: We test them. Recommend only the Best Practice.
hero.description: Test AI practice in real-world scenarios. Verify what works. Locate only the best-proven practice and open-source everything - not only the code, but the whole practice you need in real-world.

approach.title: Real Scenarios • Fair Competition • Single Best
approach.subtitle: Through the "Arena" mechanism, we fairly test AI practices in real business scenarios and recommend only verified best practices.

step1.title: Define Real-world Scenarios
step1.description: Select specific real-world problems and establish clear success criteria and evaluation frameworks. Example: Automated financial reporting, intelligent customer service Q&A

step2.title: Best Practices Compete
step2.description: Multiple solutions tested under identical conditions using real data and unified standards. Ensuring fair testing and comparable results

step3.title: Verify and Recommend Best
step3.description: Select the optimal solution based on test results, provide complete code and deployment guides. Including building of team, performance reports and cost analysis - every key elements that matters in real-world

blueprintIncludes.title: Every Blueprint Includes
blueprintIncludes.subtitle: Complete production-ready solutions, ready for immediate deployment

liveDemo.title: Live Demo
liveDemo.description: Experience actual results online to verify business fit

sourceCode.title: Complete Source Code
sourceCode.description: Open source code, auditable, customizable, supports private deployment

deploymentGuide.title: Deployment Guide
deploymentGuide.description: Detailed implementation docs and architecture guides, deploy in 1-3 days

performanceReport.title: Performance Report
performanceReport.description: Real test data including accuracy, response time, resource usage

verified.title: Verified
verified.description: All solutions tested in real scenarios with traceable data

expertTeam.title: Expert Team
expertTeam.description: AI experts from Tsinghua, Oxford and Fortune 500 Companies

replicable.title: Replicable
replicable.description: All solutions tested in real scenarios with traceable practice

finalCta.title: Ready to Find Your AI Solution?
finalCta.description: Browse verified AI blueprints, or join the developer community to contribute
finalCta.beta: Currently in beta testing, we welcome your feedback and suggestions

arena.title: AI Best Practices Arena
arena.subtitle: Discover and verify the best AI implementations

footer.brandDescription: Real-World AI Arena - Finding the best AI practices for real-world scenarios
